doc:
Tommy Rettig https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tommy_Rettig 0 Thomas Noel Rettig (December 10, 1941 – February 15, 1996) was an American child actor, computer software engineer, and author. Rettig is remembered for portraying the character "Jeff Miller" in the first three seasons of CBS's Lassie television series, from 1954 to 1957, later seen in syndicated re-runs as Jeff's Collie. He also co-starred with another former child actor, Tony Dow, in the mid-1960s television teen soap opera Never Too Young and recorded the song by that title with the group, The TR-4. Thomas_Noel_Rettig ( December_10_,_1941 – February_15_,_1996 ) was an_American_child_actor , computer_software_engineer , and author . He also co-starred with another_former_child_actor , Tony_Dow , in the_mid-1960s_television_teen_soap_opera_Never_Too_Young and recorded the_song by that_title with the_group , The_TR-4 .
